title.rendered: Online Registration for Continuing Students of Nana Babajo School of Midwifery, Malumfashi

content.rendered:
ONLINE REGISTRATION FOR CONTINUING STUDENTS OF NANA BABAJO SCHOOL OF MIDWIFERY, MALUMFASHI
This to inform all continuing students of Nana Babajo School of Midwifery, Malumfashi that online registration for 2020/2021 academic session commences on Monday 29th March, 2021 and ends on Sunday 18th April, 2021 (midnight).
Students are to visit the registration portal (https://students.st. Paul.edu.ng) and use their School Registration Number to register.
Failure to register on or before Sunday 11th April, 2021 (midnight) will attract late registration charges.
FEES BREAKDOWN FOR CONTINUING STUDENTS
School Fees (Year 2, 200L)
1. Basic Midwifery (Indigene): 11,900
2. Basic Midwifery (Private): 111,900
3. Community Midwifery: 14,900
School Fees (Year 3, 300L)
1. Basic Midwifery (Indigene): 14,900
2. Basic Midwifery (Private): 114,900
Hostel Fee: N3,600Late Registration: N5,000

Signed
Academic Secretary
For: Provost
